text: María Cristina Arango Vega (October 15, 1928 - September 15, 2017) was the widow of the 23rd President of Colombia, Misael Pastrana Borrero. She served as First Lady of Colombia from 1970 to 1974. She was also the mother of the 30th President Andrés Pastrana Arango. She was born in Bogota. Arango Vega died in Bogotá, D.C. on September 15, 2017 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:First Ladies of Colombia Category:People from Bogotá
title: María Cristina Arango Vega
